text: I reached out to @grab_sg via twitter and all they have to offer is a textbook answer for the mishaps on Mother's Day. Why is there no notification provided when the rider cancelled the order due to overwhelming orders at the merchant? Didn't even realised we have to be on standby on the app to make sure we get the order - if so, then what is the point of pre-order? We waited in vain, and a full refund is truly the bare minimum you can do. Grab officially ruined Mother's Day for us. The notification/alert system needs to be improved.
GRAB us terrible yes they are 🤣 lousy service , some more too ex not even giving back what you are paying for 👎👎👎👎👎
Ordered food at around 7 plus! Till now there’s no rider and grab didn’t just inform us through notification. Horrendous! There’s no way we could cancel the order!
Please do a full refund of my order and please see DM.

Grab is TERRIBLE!!!! Ordered at around 1740hrs ‘cos we expected delays for food due to Mothers’ Day, driver was kind enough to inform us about possible delay as he had stack orders. However, after an hour long wait, the food was still not ready and rider had to cancel so as not to delay other orders and he assured me that Grab will dispatch another rider to pick up the food order if he cancels. BUT grab cancelled my entire order after more than an hour long wait instead of getting another rider to fulfil it, and their hotline does not work at all! This order was meant for my aged grandparents who doesn’t live with us, & it was meant as a Mother’s Day surprise. Thank you Grab for leaving my grandparents hungry & ruining our Mother’s Day.

@grab_sg You have ruined Mother’s Day for us. Ordered grab food since 4pm and our driver informed by 6.30 that food is still being prepared and we need to wait for another 1.5-2hrs. We have 2 little children.
I ordered foods via grabfood around 2 hours ago , I have yet received my foods but it shown delivered and charged to my card
Can you add a function to Grab Food delivery where we can add $1/2/3/4/5... tips to the delivery people?
